title: What champion should I main
body:
Requirments:
-have to be fun
-I don't adc or sup
-or jungle
- fun mid or top basically 
First champion said in champ desc is the one I main for the rest of me lif

replies.body: Nautilus. He can be a tanky top laner

> [{quoted}](name=TrentonGW,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=bMQQLe4Z,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-02-11T04:21:48.123+0000)
>
> MIDORTOPNOTJUNGLE

And limiting yourself to the meta is limiting your fun.

he said no junglers
naut is out classed by most top laners so he wont work too good top

I think tf mid would be much better
Sej is basically nautilius on a pig and she can go mid.

top : xin zhao or singed
Mid : Malzahar or ahri

that being said, if you dont play as many champs as you can in as many roles as you can then you wont find out what works right for YOU nor will you learn the limitations of the champ you're playing against which can make your laning phase difficult since you dont know their passice, cooldowns, or combos, let alone why their combos work and how you can interrupt and or deter them from comboing on you.
Just remember at the end of the day its not the gun that failed or succeeded, its the gunner
